rules_text:
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, that player takes a burden and discards a card.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, if they have been burdened three or more times, draw a card. Then, you may exile a card from your hand face down. Until end of turn, you may look at and cast that card as though it had flash.
